screenshot.caption: A6PAGE file open in FOREVER Artisan 6

description: Artisan allows you to customize pages with photos, text, shapes, and other elements for various memory-related designs, such as scrapbooks, photo books, and calendars. You can then export them to be preserved digitally or printed.
The A6PAGE format is a Zip archive that stores various files, including:
NOTE: Artisan was formerly known as Storybook Creator and developed by Creative Memories. FOREVER then acquired Storybook Creator and re-branded it as Artisan.
